title: Company.of.Heroes.2-KaOs
description:
Release-Title:------------[ Company.of.Heroes.2-KaOs ]- 

Language:-----------------[ English ]-                  

Archive/Count/Volume:-----[ RAR 73x50MEG = 3.35GIG ]-   

Release/Date:-------------[ 29-06-2013 ]-               

Ripped/Packed:------------[ KaOsKrew ]-                 

Iso/Crack:----------------[ RELOADED ]-                 

Ripped/Removed:-----------[ Foreign Audio Only ]-       

Movie/Recode:-------------[ webm ??% ]-                 

Audio/Recode:-------------[ ReBuild ]-                  

Texture/Recode:-----------[ UnTouched ]-                

Drivers/Extras:-----------[ DX, VcRedist ]-             

INSTALL INFORMATION

Step-1:-------[ UnRAR Yourself Or Use Our Install.exe ]-

Step-2:-------[ Run ~Unpack~.bat As Administrator
                To Unpack/Rebuild ]-                            
( Our Install.exe Does This Step For You )        

Step-3:-------[ Click RelicCoH2.exe To Play ]-                 

Time: The Total Install Was About 2H 10Mins With..  8 Cores [ ]
                                                    4 Cores [*]

Included DLCs: Updated To v3.0.0.9704                           

Soviet Skin: (L) Three Color Leningrad Front                    
Soviet Skin: (M) Three Color Leningrad Front                    
Soviet Skin: (H) Three Color Leningrad Front                    
Soviet Skin: (L) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front                
Soviet Skin: (M) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front                
Soviet Skin: (H) Winter Whitewash Voronezh Front                
Soviet Skin: (L) Three Color Northwestern Front                 
Soviet Skin: (H) Three Color Northwestern Front                 
Soviet Skin: (M) Three Color Northwestern Front                 
German Skin: (L) Late War Factory Pattern                       
German Skin: (M) Late War Factory Pattern                       
German Skin: (H) Late War Factory Pattern                       
German Skin: (L) Three Color Ambush Pattern                     
German Skin: (M) Three Color Ambush Pattern                     
German Skin: (H) Three Color Ambush Pattern                     
German Skin: (L) Winter Ambush Pattern                          
German Skin: (M) Winter Ambush Pattern                          
German Skin: (H) Winter Ambush Pattern                          
Soviet Skin: (H) Winter Cobblestone West Front                  
Soviet Skin: (H) Two Tone Bryansk Front                         
German Skin: (H) Field Applied Whitewash Pattern                
German Skin: (H) Three Color Disruptive Pattern                 
Soviet Commander: Conscripts Support Tactics                    
Soviet Commander: Anti-Infantry Tactics                         
German Commander: Joint Operations Doctrine                     
German Commander: Spearhead Doctrine                            

Notes:                                                          

We Recommend Installing To A Short Path (Like The Install.exe   
Default) As Long Path Names Can Cause Missing Files On Certain  
Games During Rebuild.                                           
Unless You Changed It The Default Extraction Folder Install.exe 
Creates Is C:/Games/                                            
This Is Were You Can Find The Games exe.                        
If Install/Rebuild Seems To Freeze Leave It Alone.              
Install/Rebuild Is Normally Very Time/Space Consuming.          
(So Ensure You Have Pleanty Of Space And Patience)              

**FALSE-POSITIVES**                                           

In Some Cases Some Of Our Tools May Get Detected As Suspicious
Or As A Virus By Some Antivirus Software. This Is Also The  
Case With Some Cracks/NoDVDs. We Assure You This Is A False 
Positive And All Our Files Are Clean. If Any Of These Files 
Are Deleted The Chances Are The Game Will Not Start Or Will 
Function Incorrectly.                                       

**GAME-FAILED?**                                            

If You Are Left With Empty Folders You Have More Than Likely
Run Out Of Temporary Hard Drive Space For Decompression.    
Free Up Alot More Space And Reinstall.                      

If You Are Missing Textures Or Audio Your Antivirus Has More
Than Likely Deleted One Of Our Tools, Disable Your AV And
Install Again.

If The Game Will Simply Not Start Check Minimum Requirements, 
Update All Your Drivers, Check Our Extras Folder For Missing  
Drivers Or Reg Data What May Have Failed To Install. Also     
Make Sure Your Antivirus Has Not Deleted The Crack/NoDVD      
Or Anything Else It Shouldnt Have.
